inclusion.criterion: Age between nine months and six years
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of a chronic medical condition other than malnutrition
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Residence outside of Haiti (i.e. visiting children who usually live abroad)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain, but no chronic medical conditions other than malnutrition.
